title: 9Adventures: Halloween decorations
text:

We asked viewers to show us their Halloween decorations and preparation for 9Adventures. 9NEWS at 5 p.m. 10/24/15. Claire Sisun, KUSA 5:56 p.m. MDT October 24, 2015 CONNECT TWEET LINKEDIN COMMENT EMAIL MORE 
KUSA – Everyone is gearing up for candy eating, trick-or-treating and costuming. We asked viewers to show us their Halloween decorations and preparation for 9Adventures. 
Thanks to all the viewers that shared photos with us. You can participate in 9Adventures by tweeting your photos using #9adventures and giving us permission to use your photo on air and online. You might just see your photo on TV!
